message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. As we start our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $12000. This is a competitive price considering the product's worth to you is $10000. I believe it's a fair starting point, and I'm open to further discussion.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I have to consider the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offers. I'm proposing a new price of $11000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to you is $10000. I'm open to further discussion and willing to negotiate.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our last offer, so I'm proposing a price of $10500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $12000. I'm willing to make a small concession, and I'm proposing a new price of $11800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, considering the product's value to me. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above $11800. I'm willing to meet you at $11200. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $12000. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'm proposing a new price of $11900. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, considering the product's value to me. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $11900. I'm willing to meet you at $11500. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $12000. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'm proposing a new price of $11750. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, considering the product's value to me. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I've decided to explore other options. I'm willing to make one last offer of $11000, but I'm not serious about it. I'm leaning towards buying the product from John for $10000.
